introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: This document establishes the terms and conditions of use for ProP GMS, developed by the Galaxia Wonder team. By accessing and using this platform, you agree to be bound by these terms.

use-of-the-service.title: Use of the Service
use-of-the-service.content: The user commits to making responsible and ethical use of the platform, respecting the offered functionalities and avoiding improper use.

user-responsibility.title: User Responsibility
user-responsibility.content: The user is responsible for the accuracy of the data they provide and the proper use of the platform.

responsibility-of-the-development-team.title: Development Team Responsibility
responsibility-of-the-development-team.content: The team commits to ensuring proper software operation, performing continuous maintenance, and acting with professionalism and ethics in all development stages.

privacy-and-data-protection.title: Privacy and Data Protection
privacy-and-data-protection.content: We guarantee the confidentiality and security of user personal data, which will not be shared with third parties without consent. We comply with privacy-by-design principles and current regulations.

intellectual-property.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual-property.content: All design, development, and content rights belong to the development team, unless otherwise indicated.

ethical-and-professional-principles.title: Ethical and Professional Principles
ethical-and-professional-principles.content:
Our team adheres to the ACM/IEEE Professional Code of Ethics and the Engineers College of Peru (CIP). We promote:
Transparency in software engineering.
Commitment to quality, equity, and accessibility.
Respect for user and society rights.

modifications-and-contact.title: Modifications and Contact
modifications-and-contact.content: We reserve the right to update these terms. For inquiries, you can contact us at:

success-card.title: Registration successful!
success-card.content: Your account has been created successfully. You can now log in with your username.

errors.email-taken: A user with that email already exists.

errors.server: Could not connect to server. Please try again.

create-member.title: Invite Member
create-member.email-hint: An invitation will be sent to this email

errors.api-failed: An error occurred while updating the organization.

members.title: Organization Members
members.name: Name
members.confirm-delete: Are you sure you want to remove this member from the organization?

invitation.title: My Invitations
invitation.empty-description: When you receive organization invitations, they will appear here.
